availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Mary W. Lock c1860. Father of Elizabeth Lock, Catherine Lock, Mary M. Lock, James H. Lock, Willis L. Lock, and Marclus H. Lock. Laborer in Edmonson County, Kentucky in 1860. Appointed United States Postmaster in Edmonson County, Kentucky c1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 15. Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971_, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, [pg. 57], (accessed via Ancestry.com).
